laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Revised thyroxine dose from 100 mcg to 150 mcg due to low T4 and elevated thyrotropin.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Consistent with diagnosis of chronic telogen effluvium - no miniaturized follicles.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeated scalp biopsy in 1998 showed 32 follicles, none miniaturized, and three in telogen. Further biopsies in subsequent years continued to show consistent results.

laboratory_examinations.findings: No discernible reduction in hair density.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Ongoing reviews in 2000 and 2001 continued to show no loss of hair volume despite ongoing shedding.

laboratory_examinations.findings: T:V ratios of 13:1, 8:1, and 6:1 consistent with chronic telogen effluvium.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Further checks in 2002 and 2003 showed continued shedding but no evidence of FPHL.
